}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:29.800
    | text      = I'm depressed by it, if anything.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:35.079
    | text      = I'm not scared.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:36.079
    | text      = Well, I'm sorry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:37.079
    | text      = So according to Alex, the globalist plan with the virus was to lockdown.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:40.119
    | text      = And then when tension with the lockdown got too high, with people resisting, they'd ease
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:43.579
    | text      = the lockdown only to lockdown again later once people let off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:47.800
    | text      = It's a compelling way to experience the world, but another interpretation of this makes a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:51.599
    | text      = bit more sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:53.400
    | text      = Putting in public health protective measures is essential in terms of trying to overcome
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:57.199
    | text      = this pandemic, but they're also incredibly inconvenient.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:00.800
    | text      = And mitigating the issues that the measures bring up would require a great amount of political
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:04.800
    | text      = will and leadership, which we just don't have right now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:08.920
    | text      = Businesses being closed and forced to run safely cuts into business owners' profits,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:13.400
    | text      = and people aren't able to go to work if the place they're employed at is closed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:17.480
    | text      = There are legitimate issues that come from this, but they're mainly things that could
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:20.400
    | text      = be dealt with by providing extensive unemployment benefits for people affected by the virus
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:24.760
    | text      = closures, and similar things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:26.760
    | text      = They're measures that we could take, but -
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:29.079
    | text      = That's just incentivizing people to not get sick, Dan, and we can't do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:33.719
    | text      = Our leaders have made the decision that they just don't want to do those things, and because
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:36.900
    | text      = of that, the closures that are necessary, they're leading to heightened tensions.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:42.159
    | text      = Mixed in with that tension is the entitlement of people who just want things back to normal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:46.739
    | text      = People who feel like they deserve all the amenities and luxuries they've enjoyed, like
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:50.019
    | text      = back in late 2019, like going to crowded bars and sporting events.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:54.980
    | text      = These people are very loud, and insistent that people who are not them should be forced
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:58.380
    | text      = to go back to work to facilitate their ability to enjoy the life they feel they have the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:03.619
    | text      = These forces lead to some short-sighted leaders prematurely opening back up businesses, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:11.440

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:12.559

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:49.679

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:51.679

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}
